Sentencas: The oxidation behavior of nickel coated ferritic stainless steel SS441 has been investigated.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: A nickel coating layer is deposited on the steel which is employed in a solid oxide fuel cell stack as interconnect.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: The nickel film is about 8 mu m thick and is topped by an additional 4 mu m thick
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: La0.67Sr0.33MnO3 (LSM) film on the interconnect cathode-contacting surface for the prevention of chromium evaporation from the steel substrate.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: A 10,000-h 800 degrees C isothermal ageing on 10 x 10 mm(2) steel coupons shows a continuous growth of oxide scales up to similar to 200 mu m in thickness on the surface, consisting of a 100 mu m thick iron oxide layer followed by a complex Fe-Ni-Cr spinel structure.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: A single-cell stack is tested at 800 degrees C for up to 1226 h and an average degradation rate of 7.5% kh(-1) is observed.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: Oxidation characteristics of the coating system are analyzed after testing.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: A Fe-Ni spinel phase is found covering most of the surface area.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: This is attributed to the intensive interdiffusion of iron and nickel during the stack operation and the high intersolubility of the two elements.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: In both the tests of the steel coupons and the stack, LSM film structures are damaged by the thermally grown Fe-Ni oxides, and the expected Cr-preventing function is limited.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: The Fe-Ni spinel layer initially forms an effective obstacle against Cr out-migration.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: However, the increasing content of iron in the spinel phase induces oxide scale spallation afterwards.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application

Sentencas: Though the fast grown Fe-Ni oxide scale can serve as an effective barrier against chromium out-migration, the iron-enriched scale structure is susceptible to corrosion attacks after an extended stack operation period.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of nickel coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect for SOFC application
